# isMatchingFrameRateSupported

**Type Property**

Whether the external display supports matching frame rate to a capture device.

## Declaration

```swift
class var isMatchingFrameRateSupported: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

If `true`, you may instantiate a configurator with a configuration specifying [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureExternalDisplayConfiguration/shouldMatchFrameRate] set to `true`.

## Determining configuration support

- **isPreferredResolutionSupported**: Whether the external display supports configuration to your preferred resolution.
- **isBypassingColorSpaceConversionSupported**: Whether the external display supports bypassing color space conversion.
